QuestData.Title: A Visit with Lorewalker Cho
QuestData.Description: Stranger, I may be able to help you find your prince. But first, I would like to know a little more about you and your people.$B$BCome, help me with my chores, and we will chat.$B$BYou have the look of a grizzled war veteran, but certainly you have a few minutes to help a bookish Pandaren like myself putter around the house, yes?
QuestData.LogDescription: Befriend Lorewalker Cho by assisting him around his house: Trim his tree, paint his wall, and feed his birds.
QuestData.CompletionText: There is nothing like a little manual labor to bring strangers together, don't you think?
QuestData.RewardText: Despite your many years of combat, you've still got an eye for beauty, $n. I like that about you!$B$BNow, let's find this missing prince of yours.
